content: MetLife Inc  reported a 13.8 percent fall in quarterly operating income on Wednesday  hurt by a charge related to the spin off of its U.S. retail business  Brighthouse Financial  and the insurer authorized a $2 billion share buyback plan.
name: Brighthouse Financial Inc
title: MetLife operating income falls  authorizes $2 billion buyback

content: Nov 1 MetLife Inc reported a 13.8 percent fall in quarterly operating income on Wednesday  hurt by a charge related to the spin off of its U.S. retail business  Brighthouse Financial  and the insurer authorized a $2 billion share buyback plan.
name: Brighthouse Financial Inc
title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-MetLife operating income falls  authorizes $2 bln buyback

content: Nov 1 MetLife Inc reported a 13.8 percent fall in quarterly operating income on Wednesday  hurt by a charge related to the spin off of its U.S. retail business  Brighthouse Financial  and the insurer authorized a $2 billion share buyback plan.
name: Brighthouse Financial Inc
title: CORRECTED-MetLife says operating income falls  authorizes $2 bln buyback

content: * Q3 earnings per share view $2.14 -- Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S
name: Brighthouse Financial Inc
title: BRIEF-Brighthouse Financial reports Q3 loss per share $7.87

content: Aug 10 MetLife Inc is asking some bond investors and shareholders to approve changes that are necessary for the insurer to make interest payments as usual  and continue returning capital to common shareholders  following its recent Brighthouse Financial Inc spinoff.
name: Brighthouse Financial Inc
title: MetLife seeks changes to protect interest payments  dividends
